job.intro: I offer my developer services in the following areas:
job.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer

assignment.main: Assignment: I make my skills available to the client for a specific period of time.

quotation.info: Services with well-defined content and scope.
quotation.main: Quotation: after having defined the needs, I establish a cost estimate for carrying out the service which I undertake to respect.

time-spent.main: Time spent: the service is invoiced according to the completion time.
